question: This week i had my 20 week ultrasound and found out I'm having a boy. He's measuring right on time perfect for 20 weeks. I feel huge and this is my first baby. I have had scans for diabetes and all came back normal. My doc apt is tomorrow for my measurements. Does anyone know if it turns out I'm measuring big but the baby is perfect for 20 weeks why would this happen?
title: belly measuring help!?!?!
